content: cascade yarns ultra pima cotton 9 straight knitting needles us 4 3 5 mm row counter optional tape measure instructions 1 cast on 40 stitches 2 row 1-68 slip first stitch purlwise knit across until last stitch purl last stitch this makes a pretty smooth edge 3 bind off wash cloth will be approximately a 7 square each 100g skein will make 4 washcloths 25g each or 55 yards note photo contains 2 dishcloths before washing darker one and after many many washings lighter one
